body_html: Computing log Z can be rewritten in terms of regular matrix multiplies, but Viterbi is an interesting example. You need efficient way to compute matrix vector min-plus product r=Av as r(i) = min_j A(i,j) + v(j)
body_text: Computing log Z can be rewritten in terms of regular matrix multiplies, but Viterbi is an interesting example. You need efficient way to  compute matrix vector min-plus product r=Av as  r(i) = min_j A(i,j) + v(j)
body: Computing log Z can be rewritten in terms of regular matrix multiplies, but Viterbi is an interesting example. You need efficient way to  compute matrix vector min-plus product r=Av as  r(i) = min_j A(i,j) + v(j)
